code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./join.css';import logo from'../../images/logo.png';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";let user;const sendUser=()=>{user=document.getElementById('joininput').value;document.getElementById('joininput').value='';};const Join=()=>{const[name,setname]=useState('');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"joinpage",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"joincontainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"SAY HELLO"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{onChange:e=>setname(e.target.value),type:"text",id:"joininput",placeholder:"Enter Your Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{onClick:e=>!name?e.preventDefault():null,to:"/chat",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:sendUser,className:"joinbtn",children:"Log in"})})]})});};export default Join;export{user};
